component.name: numberMappableReads
component.doc: numberMappableReads_anduril.py runs numberMappableReads.pl that runs soft/extractData.pl and soft.bc2/frag2totalGenomic.pl. Gives the number of reads mapped by bowtie.

output.name: numberMappableReads_log
output.doc: output file containing the number of mappable reads for log.

parameter.name: FMIid
parameter.doc: FMI id to sample in FMI repository.

parameter.name: FMIpath
parameter.doc: Path to FMI directory containing samples, soft and soft.bc2 directories.

parameter.name: perlPATH
parameter.doc: Path to right perl to use for execution.
